inclusion.criterion: Hb concentration <110 g/l but not <80 g/l
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Parental or guardian approval of participation in all aspects of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Parental/guardian agreement to avoid the additional use of vitamin and mineral supplements and de-hookworm administration during the trial.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children with Hb<80 g/l and /or CRP >10 mg/l were sent to hospital with special treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He has a constant smile on his face but aggressive behavior.
